Settings.Name: AH Items
Settings.Summary: If set to true this profile will sell items on AH, otherwise it'll mail items to an alt.If mailing items to alt make sure to set the Grind Bot's 'Recipient' field to your alts name.

Settings.Name: Herb
Settings.Summary: Set to true if you want to level herbalism

Settings.Name: Mining
Settings.Summary: Set to true if you want to level Mining

Settings.Name: Ignore grey nodes
Settings.Summary: Ignores grey nodes, not fully working yet

CustomAction.Code: if (((bool)Settings["Herb"] && (HerbLevel == HerbMaxLevel || ((bool)Settings["Mining"] && HerbMaxLevel > MiningMaxLevel))) || !(bool)Settings["Herb"]) herb = Bots.Gatherbuddy.GatherbuddySettings.Instance.GatherHerbs = false;
MessageBox.Show("Please switch to Eastern Kingdoms continent");
Lua.DoString("for bag = 0,4 do for slot=1,GetContainerNumSlots(bag) do local id = GetContainerItemID(bag,slot) or 0 if id == 22573 then UseContainerItem(bag,slot) end end end");

Lua.DoString("for bag = 0,4 do for slot=1,GetContainerNumSlots(bag) do local id = GetContainerItemID(bag,slot) or 0 if id == 37703 then UseContainerItem(bag,slot) end end end");
